title: Social Sector Job Competency Enhancement Course Utilizing Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: No foundational social science theory or practical experience
context.additional_context: Social sector training program for enhancing job competencies of current professionals. Emphasizes smartphone-based learning activities in PC-unavailable settings

learning_goals: Learners can explain over 10 core social studies concepts in a gamified environment
Through game-based tasks, learners can propose at least three problem-solving strategies applicable to real-world job situations
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans in mobile environments and achieve over 80% implementation rates

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
